What can be said about the equation of the straight line x = 7?

options.A: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 7 units towards the right of the y - axis.
options.B: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 7 units towards the left of the y - axis.
options.C: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 7 units below the x - axis.
options.D: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 7 units above the x - axis.

text: What can be said about the equation of the straight line y = -8?

options.A: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 8 units below the x - axis.
options.B: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 8 units towards the left of the y - axis.
options.C: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 8 units towards the right of the y - axis.
options.D: It is the equation of a straight line at a distance of 8 units above the x - axis.
